docs.snippet: Madison Bumgarner pitched himself into the San Francisco record book, took a share of the major league lead for wins and, most important to the soft-spoken southpaw, moved his team one step closer in an NL West race that could go down to the wire....
docs.lead_paragraph: Madison Bumgarner pitched himself into the San Francisco record book, took a share of the major league lead for wins and, most important to the soft-spoken southpaw, moved his team one step closer in an NL West race that could go down to the wire.

headline.main: Bumgarner Wins 5th in Row, Giants Rout Dodgers 9-0
headline.print_headline: Bumgarner Wins 5th in Row, Giants Rout Dodgers 9-0

docs.snippet: Before beginning the most important home series of the season, Seattle coach Lloyd McClendon had a brief message....

headline.main: Seattle Uses Long Ball to Beat Oakland 4-2

docs.snippet: Even after a late flight home from Texas led into an early three-run deficit, the Los Angeles Angels' incredible late-season offensive barrage still wouldn't stop....
docs.lead_paragraph: Even after a late flight home from Texas led into an early three-run deficit, the Los Angeles Angels' incredible late-season offensive barrage still wouldn't stop.

headline.main: Angels Rout Astros 11-3 for 9th Straight Victory
